snippet.title: Albatroz | Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Set out on a beautiful journey in Albatroz: a brand-new backpacking adventure RPG. 

About Albatroz:

Leave your dull urban life behind and set out on a journey to find your lost brother, who disappeared while looking to reach a mythical mountain called Albatroz. Use your survival skills to traverse beautiful yet challenging landscapes, ranging from scorching coastal regions to freezing mountains. Manage your resources, strengthen your body, and improve your abilities as you face the wilderness head-on. Discover yourself as you find that the journey might actually be just as important as the destination.

#Albatroz #backpacking #RPG #newgame

Want to stay up-to-date on this gamer? Make sure to subscribe to our newsletter for more news on our games, giveaways, sales, events & more! 
Newsletter link: https://soedesco.us13.list-manage.com...

Follow SOEDESCO®!
Discord: https://discord.gg/soedesco
Website: http://www.soedesco.com/
Newsletter: https://bit.ly/2wsfR4f
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Soedesco
Twitter: https://twitter.com/soedesco
Instagram: https://instagram.com/soedesco

Robert: 
@averageteadrinker_ 

Video editors: 
@furia_dev 
@juanfranrivero

About SOEDESCO:
SOEDESCO is an independent video game developer, publisher, and distributor founded in 2002 by Soedesh Chauthi with its headquarters in Rotterdam, the Netherlands, and offices in Madrid, Spain & Pilsen, Czech Republic. We deliver creative content across multiple genres and platforms for a worldwide audience in physical and digital formats.

Our portfolio consists of titles such as #petitIsland, #lemoncake, #bunnypark, #airoheart, #monstercrown, #owlboy, #saintkotar , as well as original SOEDESCO IPs #truckdriver, #Adam’sVenture, #realfarm  and #dollhouse.
